# Video
Adds video element from youtube or vimeo to the page.

## Information
|  name |  version |  bundle |
|--|:--:|--:|
|  widget-video |  2.1.5 |  Launchpad |

## Dependencies

- base 2.x
- core 2.x
- ui 2.x

## Dev Dependencies

- config 2.x
- angular-mocks ~1.2.28

## Preferences

- **height**: Original Height
- **source**: Source
- **videoId**: Video ID
- **width**: Original Width

## Develop Standalone
```bash
git clone <repo-url> && cd <widget-path>
bower install
```
## Test
```bash
bblp start
```
with watch flag

```bash
bblp test -w
```
## Build
```bash
bblp build
```
